She works in the roll of coordinator, and she knows how to satisfy her customers’ needs.  The effort that she makes is for a great reason, to leave her children a good heritage when they are grown.  

That is why she is requesting help by means of Kiva in order to be able to improve her home.

loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Bulmaro

texts.es:
El señor Bulmaro es originario de la ciudad de Pueblo y su esposa la señora Lorena es de San Luis Potosí tiene mas de 15 años vivienda en esta ciudad Nuevo Laredo, cuentan con dos hijos que están estudiando la primaria.
El señor Bulmaro esta solicitando un préstamo para la colocación de las ventanas de su iglesia cristiana, donde el predica tiene ya mas de cinco años dedicando se a ser pastor y ayudando a su comunidad cristiana.
Desea mejora y condicionar el lugar donde su comunidad y sus familiares estén más cómodos al orar.
Con el ingreso que el obtiene de su trabajo como pastor será para pagar el crédito.
texts.en:
Bulmaro is originally from the city of Pueblo and his wife Lorena is from San Luis Potosi. They have been living in the city of Nuevo Laredo fro more than 15 years, and they have two children in primary school.

Bulmaro is requesting a loan for the replacement of the windows in his church, where he has spent the last five years as the pastor, preaching  and helping the community.

He wants to improve the place and make it somewhere the community and their families will be more comfortable praying. He will repay the loan with his salary as a pastor.

loans.use: to replace the windows.

loans.name: Bethel Group

texts.en:
Xiomara is one of the members of the Bethel Group. This group is located in one of the rural communities surrounding San Pedro de Macorís, a city famous for baseball players and the sugarcane industry. The main economic activities are a free trade zone and a cement factory. There are 15 borrowers in the group who are businessmen and businesswomen. 

Xiomara's business is a grocery store run from her house. She makes her home in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their child. She has had her business for almost four years. 

Xiomara is excited to be taking out her eighth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to invest this loan in her business to increase her inventory. She will reinvest her profits in the business and save money. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, sugar, flour, vegetables, etc. for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her daughter's tuition

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.es:
Leopoldo tiene 40 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de San Cristóbal, al sur del país. Tiene 2 hijos, de 17 y 14 años de edad, ambos estudiando en una escuela pública de la comunidad. 

El negocio de Leopoldo es venta de hamburguesas y sándwiches en carritos móviles. Tiene 3 carritos de ventas en diferentes zonas de la comunidad. Estos carritos de hamburguesas son muy comunes aquí en el país y por tanto hay mucha competencia. Muchas veces hay varios en la misma calle y muy cerca uno del otro, lo que hace que el empresario se mantenga siempre renovando y aumentando su oferta para atraer la mayor cantidad de clientes. Leopoldo desea los 10,600 pesos para poder comprar más materiales y productos para la preparación de estos alimentos y así brindar un mejor servicio a los consumidores, lo que a su vez ayudará a incrementar sus ganancias y mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Leopoldo is 40 and lives in the city of San Cristóbal, in the south of the country. He has two children, ages 17 and 14. Both study at a local public school in the community.
Leopoldo has a business selling hamburgers and sandwiches in mobile carts. He has three sales carts in different zones in his community. These little hamburger carts are very common here in this country, so there is a lot of competition. A lot of the time there are several in the same street, very close to one another. He keeps his business in good shape and increases his stock in order to attract more clients. Leopoldo would like these 10,600 pesos so that he can buy more materials and products for making these foods and so that he can offer a better customer service. This will help him to increase both his income and his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials and products to expand his business.

loans.name: L'espoir 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.fr:
Jonas est le coordinateur de son groupe L'Espoir 1, 2 & 3. Il es un commercant. tous les membres de ce groupe vivent dans la région DE BOR DE MER où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Jonas a dirigé son commerce pendant 6 années. Avant de commencer ce commerce Jonas était un etudiant.

Jonas voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans les produit divers(cosmetiques, chaussures, vetements). Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son commerce de produit divers. Des autres membres militant ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme Divers produit. Il dit que les défis principal c'est devenus une grande commerçante.
texts.en: Jonas is the coordinator of his group, Hope 1, 2 & 3.  He is a merchant.  All of the members of the group live in the De Bor De Mer region of Haiti where electricity is rare and water is very scarce.  Jonas has run his business for 6 years.  Before becoming a merchant, Jonas was a student.  Jonas wants to use this loan to invest in various products, such as shoes and various clothing items.  He hopes that this loan will help grow his business and stock of diverse products.  The other members need loans for their businesses such as selling diverse products.  He says that the main goal is to become a top merchant.

loans.use: To buy shoes and clothing items

loans.name: Sharon Andrea

texts.es: La Sra. Sharon sigue con la actividad de la venta de Cereales y Chocolates, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de mercadería por mayor,  creció en su actividad e incremento su clientela, y por ende sus ingresos económicos, en esta ocasión solicito el crédito para la compra de cereales y chocolates por mayor para seguir incrementando su capital de trabajo, se siente feliz y agradecida por esta nueva oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Sra. Sharon continues her business of selling cereal and chocolates.  She says that she did very well with her previous loan and used the money to buy merchandise in bulk.  Sharon grew her business and increased her clientele, as well as her income.  

On this occasion, she is requesting a loan in order to buy cereal and chocolate in bulk as a way of continuing to increase her operating capital.  She is pleased and appreciative of this new opportunity that has been given to her.

loans.use: to buy cereal and chocolates in bulk.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga, de 24 años de edad es una mujer sencilla y alegre. Vive en compañía de su pequeña hija en la casa de sus padres .Como mujer y madre soltera luchadora y con aspiraciones, se dedica al negocio de compra y venta de animales, su especialidad es la crianza de cerdos, los cuales comercializa para tener ingresos constantes. Pero su principal ingreso económico es la agricultura con la siembra de papa y maíz en los terrenos que le fueron heredados de sus padres, afirma que desde pequeña tiene el conocimiento de las técnicas de cultivo, “mis padres aprendieron a sembrar de manera natural, ellos hacen descansar la tierra para que pueda producir alimentos nutritivos y sanos”, afirma. Es así que ahora desea ampliar sus terrenos y sembrar en extensas áreas. Este es el primer crédito con KIVA, agradece la oportunidad que le brindan, ya que podrá mejorar su negocio ,por ello se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Olga, invertirá los S/.500 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Olga is 24 years old and is a simple and happy woman. She lives with her small daughter in her parents' house. As a striving woman and single mother with aspirations, she makes a living from buying and selling animals. Her specialty is raising pigs, which she sells in order to have a constant income. But her primary source of financial earnings is agriculture, planting potatoes and corn in the land she inherited from her parents. She says that she has had knowledge of the techniques of cultivation from the time she was a little girl. “My parents learned to plant in the natural way; they let land rest in order to produce nutritious and healthy food,” she says. In this way, she now wants to broaden her land and plant in extensive areas.

This is her first loan with Kiva. She is thankful for the opportunity provided, as she will be able to improve her business. In return she commits to making her monthly payments in a punctual manner.

Olga will invest the 500 Peruvian nuevos soles in buying organic fertilizer to nurture her crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Arcadia

texts.es: La Sra. Arcadia de 42 años es casada y tiene dos hijos que dependen aun de ella y de su esposo. Viven en casa propia en la cual ya viven desde hace más de 15 años. Su esposo lo apoya con su pensión y ella cuenta con su negocio de productos de belleza desde hace dos años. Ella necesita ayuda por medio de kiva para poder comprar más mercancía y poder atraer más clientes. Actualmente también ingreso a una maquiladora en la localidad para poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos, ya que ella quiere  dejarles un buen patrimonio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Arcadia is 42 years old, and is married with two young children. She and her family have lived in their own home for the past 15 years, and both she and her husband work very hard to support their children and give them a bright future. Arcadia runs a small business selling health and beauty products from her home, a business she started two years ago. 

With the support from this loan, Arcadia plans to purchase merchandise to stock her beauty business. She hopes this investment will allow her to offer her clients a wider variety of products as well as attract new clients. In addition to her cosmetics sales business, Arcadia also works in a factory, since she and her husband need to work very hard to make ends meet.

loans.use: to purchase health and beauty merchandise to stock her business.

loans.name: Emma

texts.es: La Sra. Emma, tiene 41 años tiene 3 hijos de las edades de 6, 3 y 15 años, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas de temporada, desde hace ya bastante tiempo tiene su puesto fijo por la zona de Pampahasi, esta es su actividad principal, pero tiene una segunda actividad que es la confección de ropa deportiva ella entrega a distintos colegios en esta  ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de tela para  su segunda actividad que es la confección de deportivos La Sra. Emma es una cliente responsable quien trabaja con nosotros desde hace tiempo, La Sra. Emma enfrenta retos en su negocio que son salir de la pobreza y  va a utilizar los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida y la  de su familia.
texts.en:
Emma is 41 years old.  She has three children that are 3, 6, and 15 years old.  She sells seasonal fruit and for a long time she has had a permanent stall in the Pampahasi district.  This is her principal business however; she has a second business making sports clothing that she delivers to different schools. 

In this occasion, she is requesting a loan to buy fabric for her second business that is making sports clothing. Emma is a responsible client who has worked with us for a long time.  Emma faces challenges in her business which are getting out of poverty.  She is going to use the benefits in order to improve the quality of her life and the life of her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric for making sports clothes

loans.name: Jussely

texts.es: Jussely, de 31 años de edad, es una joven madre de familia trabajadora, vive junto a su esposo Roger  y su querida hija Ángela de 8 años .Jussely se dedica a cultivar choclos, papas, alverjas, etc, en las chacras que heredo de sus padres por eso ella trabaja todos los días arduamente, para luego cosechar sus productos y venderlos en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene en el desempeño de su labor, ya que ella decide que es lo mejor para sus cultivos, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hasta el mercado, ya que la mayoría de veces, le es muy difícil conseguir un carro que quiera llevarla. En el futuro, espera poner un puesto en el mercado y asi conseguir más ingresos para su familia .Jussely, invertirá los S/.3800 soles en la compra de abono orgánico el cual sirve para nutrir sus sembríos .
texts.en: Jussely, who is 31-years old, is a young and hard-working mother.  She lives with her husband, Roger, and her dear daughter, 8-year old Ángela.  Jussely makes her living growing corn, potatoes, peas etc. in the plots of land that she inherited from her parents.  She works hard every day to later be able to harvest her crops and sell them in the whole-sale market in the city.  What she likes best about her work is the freedom she has in carrying out her labors.  She is the one who decides what is best for her crops.  She has been doing this work for ten years, and she feels that the most difficult part is transporting her harvested crop to the market.  Most of the time, it is very difficult for her to get a ride.  In the future, she hopes to have a stall in the market so she can increase the income she earns for her family.  Jussely will invest the S/.3800 soles (USD $1475) in the purchase of compost, which serves to nourish her sown fields.

loans.use: to purchase compost.

loans.name: Saiah

texts.en:
Saiah, a 30-year-old woman, lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well-known market areas in Montserrado county. She did not attend school. She is single and has four children between the ages of 9 and 13, who are in school and live at home. 

For the past three years she has been selling spoons, bowls and plates, in the local market. Sometimes sales are slow, but most of the time she realizes a profit, and she uses it to sustain her family. She is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase more goods to resell at her business, including spoons, bowls, and plates. She hopes to build a house, in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more spoons, bowls, and plates to resell at her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a computer to track sales.

loans.name: Shalom 6 & 7 Group

texts.en:
Maria is the coordinator of the "Shalom 6 & 7” group, located in the town of Hato Mayor, which is one of the most rural towns in the Dominican Republic, surrounded by mountains and lush vegetation.

Maria is running a business selling clothing, cosmetics, shoes and other products. She is the mother of a child, and she lives with her child's father. She tells us that her most difficult challenge is to have a successful business. She is dreaming to have a very large general store in her community, a store where she can sell to wholesalers. Her most favorite activity is attending to her business. This is her 14th loan, after having repaid her previous loans satisfactorily. She has been in business for around seven years, having begun selling cosmetics with some saving she had.

Maria will use this loan to purchase jeans, shirts, underwear, cosmetics, shoes, jewelry and other miscellaneous products. She is planning to use her business profits to save, because she wants to have capital to invest more in her business inventory and maybe the local. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: To buy inventory for her general store, including clothing, shoes, cosmetics, jewelry, and others

loans.name: Samneang

texts.en:
Samneang is 27 years old. He is married and lives with two children in Takeo province, Cambodia. For over two years, he has been running a business purchasing junk material to sell, earning approximately $5 daily. His wife (who joins him in the picture) is a garment worker who makes an income of $6 each day. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Samneang is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase more junk material to sell. This would enable him to earn more profit to support the family. 

In the future, he would like to expand his business, and send his children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase more junk materials to sell.

loans.name: Yann

texts.en:
Yann is 44 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Takeo province, Cambodia. She has been selling food for more than four years, earning approximately $7 daily. Her husband runs a motor repair shop; he earns about $5 each day. Two of her children are blacksmiths, and they make about $14 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Yann requests a loan of $1,000 to purchase grocery items to sell.  By doing so, she would be able to generate additional income for the family.

In the future she would like to expand the business, and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia de 47 años es madre soltera de tres hijos los cuales se han convertido en el motor de su vida, la fuerza que la impulsa a salir adelante para garantizarles mejores oportunidades. Desde hace más de 15 años reside en el municipio de Itagüí, Colombia en donde se dedica a la comercialización de bebidas, actividad que le genera el pan diario y los recursos para una vivienda y la educación de sus hijos. Diariamente labora de cinco de la mañana a doce del medio día y posteriormente cuida de su familia.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará en la compra de productos de la canasta familiar con el fin de ampliar su línea de productos y aumentar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
47-year-old Patricia is a single mother.  She has three children who are her driving force in life.  They provide the strength she needs to make progress so that she can offer them better opportunities. 

Patricia has lived in the town of Itagüí, Colombia for more than 15 years.  Her business is selling drinks.  This makes her the income she needs to feed, house and educate her children.  She works from 5.00am to 12.00pm each day and then looks after her family.

Patricia is requesting a loan to buy basic household products so that she can expand the range of goods she sells and thereby increase her income so that she can improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy household staples

loans.name: Jaclyn

texts.en:
This loan will allow Jaclyn to purchase additional equipment to expand her Pilates studio.

After studying with world-renowned Pilates instructors in Europe, Jaclyn decided to open her own business to share her talent and passion for the therapeutic benefits of Pilates. Jaclyn began her own business, Ms. Jackie LLC, in October 2011, and now runs her own studio in the Aventura community in South Florida. Jaclyn specializes in athletic performance enhancement and has worked with players from the NFL, NBA, IFBB Pro Figure models, Broadway dancers and Olympic figure skaters. She also has clientele of all levels—from beginner to expert—and welcomes everyone from new mothers to drop-in clients.

Jaclyn hopes to continue educating clients on the lasting health benefits of Pilates and expand her practice to reach more clients. She also volunteers once a week at a local women’s shelter teaching Pilates to the residents. She hopes that she will have the capital to one day expand and develop this idea into a permanent program. Jaclyn is looking for a loan to purchase additional equipment and marketing materials to attract more clients.

Visit Jaclyn’s site at: www.ms-jackie.com

loans.use: to purchase equipment and advertising for her Pilates studio.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es: El Sr. Elias  tiene 25 años,  el   se dedica a la Agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también papa, yuca y maíz en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de Pacay,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  El Sr. Elias  va a utilizar  este préstamo para la compra de semillas para la siembra de papa y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, El Sr. Elias  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios Para mejorara la su calidad de vida El Sr. Elias  es una persona  responsable y trabajadora se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Elias, 25, makes a living in agriculture, planting a variety of vegetables such as potatoes, yuca, and corn on his land, which is located in the community of Pacay. 

This loan is his second with the institution. Elias will use this loan to buy seeds for planting potatoes, which implies preparing the soil. His reason for applying for this loan is to obtain the resources necessary for planting and to be able to sustain himself.

Elias confronts challenges in his business, such as the harsh weather which often ruins his crops. He will use his earnings to improve his quality of life. Elias is a responsible and hardworking person. He is grateful to the institution for the support which they have given him.

loans.use: to buy seeds for planting potatoes

loans.name: Obispo

texts.es: El Sr. Obispo  tiene 25 años, casado con dos hijos de las edades de 1 y 5 años,  el   se dedica a la Agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también papa, yuca y maíz en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de Pacay, Tambien se dedica  a la venta de madera para la fabricacion de carbon,  este préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución,  El Sr. Obispo  va a utilizar  este préstamo para la siembra de papa y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, El Sr. Obispo  es una persona  responsable y trabajadora se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esto le permite mejorar sus ingresos, el vende sus productos en el mercado de la localidad directamente del productor al consumidor.
texts.en:
Señor Obispo is 25 and married with two children, who are one and five years old.  He makes a living in agriculture by planting an assortment of vegetables as well as potatoes, yucca, and corn in his plot of land located in the community of Pacay.  He also makes a living selling wood for the production of coal. 

This loan is his third cycle with the institution.  Señor Obispo is going to use this loan to plant potatoes and to have the means to live.  He is a responsible and hard-working person who is grateful to the institution for the support they offered because this allowed him to improve his income.  

He sells his products in the town market directly from the producer to the consumer.

loans.use: to plant potatoes.

loans.name: Khantaty Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KHANTATY”  iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por diez integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Gaby es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, venta de comida, kiosco de productos varios, tienda de golosinas,  venta de verduras, venta de leche.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Gaby es integrante, ella indica que hace un años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora  de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; da a conocer hace diez años solo vendía galletas sus compañeras de su grupo en Pro Mujer, posterior con la asesoría de las socias y el personal de la institución implementó su negocio en su zona.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumento de capital (compra de equipo de fotocopias) que adquirirá de las tiendas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo implementará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene ocho hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros.
texts.en:
The "KHANTATY" communal bank will begin their third cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Copacabana Regional Hub. It is made up of ten members, and is led by a Board of Directors, where Gaby is the President. The businesses run by the members of the communal bank are varied. Among them there is: a corner shop, food sales, miscellaneous products kiosk, candy store, vegetables sales, milk sales.

The loan they take out will benefit small entrepreneurs where Gaby is a member. She says that she joined Pro Mujer a year ago at the invitation of a promoter of the institution who went to visit her at home. She currently has a corner shop business; she started it ten years ago selling just cookies [to] her fellow Pro Mujer members, and later with the advice of the members and staff of the institution she implemented her business in her area.

The loan she will now take out is to increase capital (purchase of photocopying equipment) which she will get from the shops in the city of El Alto and subsequently implement it in her premises. This way of working allows her to generate income to maintain her home as much as possible, as she is married and has eight children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she likes the savings.

loans.use: to buy photocopying equipment

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es:
Jessica, de 30 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 02 hijos , juntos viven en la casa de su cuñado . Jessica se dedica a la agricultura y tiene un terreno propio con sembríos de cacao pero al mismo tiempo tiene un negocio de alquiler de video juegos en la casa de su cuñado, en el trabajo de video juegos lleva 04 años, mientras que en el sembrío de cacao lleva recién 02 años y lo hace en su propio terreno que tiene a unos kilómetros de la casa que habita.  Realiza esta actividad sola, ya que su pareja trabaja haciendo otras actividades.
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede estar en su casa casi todo el tiempo del día, así puede ver a sus hijos ya que necesitan de su cuidado por que aun son muy pequeños, hasta ahora todo le va bien y espera poder seguir así.Este es el  préstamo número 06 con Kiva y espera que le siga yendo bien ya que está muy agradecida por la oportunidad que le dan para poder tener mayor capital para su negocio.
Con el monto solicitado de S/.4000 soles, realizara el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de cacao.
texts.en:
Jessica, 30, is married and has two children.  They live together in her brother-in-law's house.

Jessica makes a living in agriculture and has her own plot of land where she grows cacao.  She also has a business renting video games in her brother-in-law's house.  She has had this job for four years but she has only two years of experience planting cacao, which she does on her plot of land a few kilometers from the house where she lives.  She does this job alone because her partner works in other jobs. 

What she likes about her job is she can be at home almost all day.  This way she can see her children, who need her care because they're still very young.  Up to now everything's going very well for her and she hopes it continues that way.

This is her sixth Kiva loan and she hopes it continues to go well for her because she's very grateful for the opportunity they give her to be able to have more capital for her business.

With the requested amount of 4000 soles [PEN] she'll do maintenance on her cacao plants.

loans.use: to maintain her cacao plants .

loans.name: Sovannara

texts.en:
Sovannara is 46 years old. He is a widower and has been blessed with three children. He lives in Takeo Province, Cambodia. He is a doctor, who makes an income of $10 daily. His children are school.

In order to improve his family’s finances, Sovannara is requesting a loan of $1,000 US. He will use the loan to purchase medicine for resale to his patients who need them. This money will help him to obtain enough medicines for treatment, and to earn more money to support the family. In the future, he would like to rebuild his house and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase medicine for resale to his patients

loans.name: Saeni

texts.en: Saeni is 38 years old and married with three children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, taamu, yams, and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years. Saeni needs a loan to buy weed spray, a chain-saw, and bush-knives for her plantation. She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. Saeni will use the profits from her sales to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed spray, a chain-saw, and bush-knives for her business

loans.name: Elvia

texts.en:
Elvia is a businesswoman, running a clothing sales enterprise in the city of Hato Mayor. This is a rural area, where agricultural activities are common. Elvia has had her business for around ten years. After successfully repaying her previous loans, she is ready for another one and will invest it all in her business, which she started with her savings and expanded with her first loan from Esperanza.

Elvia is dedicated to selling different styles of clothes for women, men and kids. In her small business you can find jeans, pants, shirts, blouses, t-shirts, etc. Elvia will use this loan to expand her business inventory by purchasing all these kinds of goods. She lives with her long-term partner and their four children. She said her most difficult challenge is to thrive with her business. She thanks you all for your support!

loans.use: To buy new clothes for her business inventory, including styles for women, men and kids

loans.name: Roun

texts.en:
Aged 54 years old, Roun is a married mother of six children living in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Cambodia. Out of her six children, she still has one who is in school. Rice farming is the main source of the family’s income and her husband supplements the income by fishing. Having been in this business for 30 years, Roun can earn about 40,000 KHR per day but she can save about 15,000 KHR each day after daily expenses.
 
Roun is just with VisionFund this cycle. Now she is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 KHR from VisionFund to buy fertilizer and rice seeds for her farmland. She will use a portion of the loan for plowing the rice field. With this loan, Roun hopes to grow her rice healthfully and sell it for a good price to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Fuente De Bendicion 7 Group

texts.en:
Hirza is one of the members of La Fuente de Bendicion 7 (The Source of Blessing 7). They are five micro-entrepreneurs in the rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, an agricultural area. Hirza is the mother of five children, and they live together with her long-term partner, in a rural village outside the town. She started selling clothes almost ten years ago. 

Hirza is receiving her eighth loan. She repaid her previous loans on time and made good investments. She is planning to use her new loan to purchase miscellaneous products to resell, like clothes, shoes, cosmetics, etc. She started her business with a loan she received from Esperanza almost nine years ago. After she had taken her first three loans from us, she stopped taking loans from Esperanza for approximately three years, but now she has started again. Since this second chance, she has taken eight other loans. 

Hirza will use the profits to continue rebuilding her house. Little by little, she plans to finish building it. Her most important challenge is to continue improving her business. She is really focused on helping her children to get a better education, good health and a better life. She thanks you all for your support!!!

loans.use: To buy inventory to resell, including clothes, shoes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Penelope

texts.en: Penelope, 43, is married with 7 children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, taamu, yams, and bananas that she sells in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 3 years. Penelope needs a loan to buy a knapsack, wheelbarrow, chemicals, knives, and file for her garden. She has been a member of SBPD since 2010. Penelope will use the profits from her sales to pay for her children's school fees and to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a knapsack, wheelbarrow, chemicals, knives, file,etc

loans.name: Moern's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural area located in the Moung Russey district where rice farming is a common way to earn a living, Moern is aged 55 years and married. To support the family, she and her husband have struggled to feed her six children by farming rice on three-hectare farmland and working for others for a fee. Out of her six children, one is dependent and still in school. Having been in the business for 12 years, the current business earns her approximately 30,000 KHR per day.
 
Moern has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for five cycles and she completely paid back the loan, while her group member is just with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Moern will use her portion to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend for gasoline for water pumping. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more crop yield so as to make a better living and keep her child in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland

loans.name: Kheng's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of the Moung Russey district, Kheng is 38 and married with six children, two of whom are still in school. 

The main sources of the family’s income are from rice farming and working for others for a fee. Kheng and her husband have been in this line of work for ten years to make a living.

Kheng’s group consists of two members and she has been with VisionFund for three loan cycles. She has successfully used the past loans to better support her family. Now she can earn about 18,000 KHR per day. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Kheng will use her portion to buy fertilizers, rice seeds and pesticide for her farmland. Kheng hopes to make more income so as to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers, rice seeds and pesticide for her farmland

loans.name: Guram

texts.en:
Guram is 49 years old. He lives in the Telavi district with his wife, retired father and two sons (21 and 24 years old). 

Guram has requested a loan from local financial institutions several times so he can start a family business. However, he has not had any success. His loan request was always rejected because of his low income and his family’s poor living conditions. 

Guram's family runs an agricultural business. They have two milk cows, which they milk to be able to sell dairy products. They also have a vineyard and a plot of agricultural land. All the harvested products and dairy products are sold locally at the markets. In addition, Guram makes wooden chairs and sells them to the villagers to earn more money for the family.  

Guram has requested a loan from Credo to start a family business. His loan request was approved within the framework of a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program provides credit to the rural poor, who do not have access to credit products because they are regarded as “high risk borrowers” due to their low income. 

With the received loan, Guram will purchase all the needed washing products and equipment to open a car wash business. His sons will be helping him so Guram will not have to pay a salary to somebody else. This will significantly decrease his expenses and increase his income. With the increased income, Guram will be able to better look after his aging father and provide a better future for his family.

loans.use: To start a car wash business

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde el Peru! Este es el  grupo “Las Emprendedoras”

El Sr. Roque tiene 35 años, vive con esposa y sus hijos. El trabaja como cobrador en una linea de transporte público, se siente feliz por lo que hace, ya que así puede sostener a su familia.Roque trabaja todos los días con la finalidad de poder seguir ahorrando, lo que mas desea es juntar dinero para comprarse un carro; y asi trabajar haciendo taxi, el dinero de sus prestamos sera de mucha ayuda para lograr lo que tanto ansia, esta agradecido a EDAPROSPO Y a los inversores de KIVA quienes quienes le permitirán lograr sus sueños.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru! This is the "Las Emprendedoras" ("The Entrepreneurs") communal bank.

Roque is 35 years old and lives with his wife and children. He works as a ticket collector in a public transportation route. He's happy doing what he does, since he's able to support his family this way. Roque works every day in order to continue saving money. His biggest wish is saving enough money to buy a car and then work in taxi services. The money from the loan will be a big help for him to achieve what he so eagerly wants. He's thankful to EDAPROSPO and to Kiva lenders who will allow him to achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to purchase a car.

loans.name: Mario Concepcion

texts.es:
Mario es un hombre de 67 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposa y sus 2 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador  y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Mario no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
 Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Mario trabaja en su pequeño negocio donde brinda servicios de hospedaje, él trabaja todo el día por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Mario se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de sabanas, edredones y adicionalmente podrá hacer algunas refacciones a su hospedaje, de esta manera Mario podrá seguirá tendiendo a sus clientes brindándoles un mejor servicios, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de algún día tener un gran hotel.
texts.en:
Mario is a 67-year-old man. He lives in the town of Nazca with his wife and his two children. He loves them and they're his main reason for living. He's a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person, and alongside his wife he makes every effort to get his family ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and out of the need to work from a very young age, Mario wasn't able to study for a career in business administration. In his free time he enjoys having a little time to read. Occasionally, he cooks a delicious "arroz con pollo" (rice and chicken) that he shares with his family.
On his own initiative, and with a lot of hard work and dedication, Mario works on his small business providing accommodation services. He works everyday for about 12 hours. He believes that he does well because of his experience and the kind way in which he treats his customers.
Mario is currently very thankful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help they provide he'll be able to purchase sheets and blankets. In addition, he'll be able to do some refurbishing on his bed and breakfast. Therefore Mario will be able to tend to his customers by providing them with better service. That way he'll keep on working and striving in order to accomplish his biggest dream of owning a big hotel someday.

loans.use: to purchase sheets and blankets, and to refurbish his bed and breakfast.

loans.name: Totoa

texts.en:
Totoa is 23 years old single lady with no children. She has a small garden where she grows cucumbers, tomatoes, taro,and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 2 years. Totoa needs a loan to buy weed spray, chemicals, knives, a spade, an ax, and fertilizer for her garden.

She has been a member of SBPD since 2013. Totoa will use the profits from her sales to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy weed spray, chemicals, knives, a spade, an ax, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Fiataua

texts.en: Fiataua is a 47 year-old married woman with 1 child. She grows taro, cucumbers, tomatoes and yams to earn a living. Fiataua has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed spray, a chainsaw, and knives for her garden. Fiataua will use her profits to support her family.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed spray, a chainsaw, and knives for her business

loans.name: Faimalie

texts.en: Faamalie is 42 years old with 5 children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, taamu, yams and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 2 years. Faamalie needs a loan to pay for her children's school fees and new equipment like weed spray, chemicals, knives, spade, an ax,and fertilizer for her garden. She has been a member of SBPD since 2009. Faamalie will use the profits from her sales to renovate her house and to support her family.

loans.use: to pay for her children's school fees and to buy weed spray, chemicals, knives, a spade, an ax,and fertilizer

loans.name: Pedro Fidel

texts.es: Don Pedro es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y frijol. Don Pedro desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso a solicitado un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, entre otras cosas, para seguir llevando el pan de cada dia a su hogar.
texts.en: Pedro is a very responsible man with his home obligations, since he is known for alway providing the best to his children. He presently lives with his wife and children and earns his living through agriculture, sowing corn and beans. Pedro wants to increase his sales and for this reason he is asking for a loan which will allow him to buy seeds  and manure to continue bringing home the bread every day.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Don jorge se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra maiz y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable y trabajador vive con su esposa y sus hijos. El esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y asi tener un mejor estabilidad economica
texts.en: Jorge has worked in agriculture for many years. He sows corn and with the income from his sales he is able to cover his household expenses. He is a responsible and hard-working man, and lives with his wife and children. He asking for a loan to buy agricultural supplies for the harvest, since with his income he is unable to cover these costs, and in this way to improve his financial stability.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Karol Estefani

texts.es:
Karol es una joven de 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ciudad con playas hermosas, una gastronomía variada, lugares turísticos hermosos como por ejemplo la hacienda “San Jose”, entre otros los cuales con muy visitados por los turistas. Karol es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, sobre todo porque quiere ser orgullo de su familia y sobre todo de sus padres. Tal es así que Karol trabaja como empleada del hogar, ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto estudia la carrera de Computación e informática y apoya con los gastos del hogar; ella cree que está saliendo adelante porque es honesta, responsable y sobre todo tiene muchas aspiraciones.

Karol está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá mejorar el pequeño cuarto donde vive ya que presenta grietas en las paredes y el filtrado de humedad, así ella podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y poder ser una gran profesional”.
texts.en:
Karol, 21, lives in the city of Chincha. A city with beautiful beaches, a varied gastronomy, and beautiful tourist sports such as the "San Jose" farm which among others, is a very popular with tourists. 

Karol is very eager to get ahead, above all because she wants to be the pride of her family, especially her parents. 

Karol works as a domestic servant. She works about nine hours a day and with the fruit of her labor she is able to study for  her degree in IT and help out with the family expenses. 

She believes she is getting ahead because she is honest, responsible and above all has many aspirations. 

Karol is very thankful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help she has been given, she can improve the small room where she lives since it has cracks in the walls and humidity is leaking in. 

This way she can improve her quality of life and keep fighting every day to make her biggest dream come true: "Graduate and be a successful professional".

loans.use: to improve her housing

loans.name: Faatauuu

texts.en:
Faatauu, a 26-year-old married mother of four, has a small garden where she grows taro, taamu, yams and bananas that she sells in her community and at the market. She has been doing this for two years.

A member of SBPD since 2010, Faatauu is requesting a loan to buy chemicals, weed spray, a chainsaw and knives for her business. She will use the profits from her sales to pay for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed spray, a chainsaw, knives, etc.

loans.name: Sing

texts.en:
A rural villager from the Moung Russey district, Sing is 64 years old and married. He has eight children and two of them are still in school. He is a rice farmer with eight hectares of farmland. Having been in this business for almost 44 years, he currently can earn about 30,000 KHR per day.
 
This is the second microloan for Sing with VisionFund. The first loan has helped him better support his family. Now he is applying for another of 3,000,000 KHR to buy rice seeds for his farmland and to spend a portion of it on repairing his hand tractor. He hopes this loan will enable him to increase his family’s income to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds for his farmland

loans.name: Carlito

texts.en: Carlito is 42 years old, married, and has three school-age children. He is a farmer raising his family in a rural community. He aimed to improve his corn farming business in order to increase his yields and income to satisfy his family's needs and continue sending his children to school. He wants them to earn a degree so that they will be employed someday. Despite hardship, he has the determination to work out his plan. To improve the business, he is asking for additional capital of PHP 20,000 to buy the needed fertilizers and herbicides and pay the labor cost incurred in planting corn. He believes that this loan will be a great help for him to improve his farming business, and he hopes that he will have a plentiful harvest.

loans.use: to buy the needed fertilizers and herbicides and pay the labor cost incurred in planting corn

loans.name: Grover Bruno

texts.es: El Sr. Grover  tiene 30 años y 2 hijos de las edades de 9 y 5 años, todos se encuentran en edad escolar, se dedica a la venta y fabricación de artesanías el realiza joyas y bisutería para mujeres de manera manual, el tiene su  puesto de venta que se encuentra en la zona de Raúl Salmon,  este préstamo es su primera  secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Grover  va a usar este préstamo para la compra materiales para la fabricación de sus artesanías,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, El Sr. Grover  va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando materiales y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una tienda de artesanía grande y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela,  El Sr. Grover  es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en: Mr. Grover is 30 years old and has two children who are 9 and 5 years old, they are all school age, and he makes a business out of making artisan jewelry and trinkets by hand for women. His shop is located in the zone Raul Salmon and this is his first loan with this institution. Mr. Grover is going to use the loan to purchase materials to make his artisan jewelry and to increase his sales. His hopes for his business are to have a bigger shop and to be able to give better service to his customers. Mr. Grover is a hard working individual and is happy for this opportunity.

loans.use: purchase the materials to make jewelry.

loans.name: Tautua

texts.en: Tautua is a 39-year-old married woman with 3 children. She makes and sells ice cake in her community to earn a living. She has 2 years of experience with this business. Tautua needs a loan to buy timber, roofing materials, cement, and nails for her house renovation. She plans to use her profits to pay for her children's school fees. Tautua has been a member of SPBD since 2009.

loans.use: to buy timber, roofing materials, nails, and paint

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: El Sr. Edgar viene de una familia numerosa compuesta de 7 hermanos de los cuales los mayores empezaron a salir desde muy jóvenes en busca de mejores condiciones de vida llegando hasta emigrar a argentina, quedando el cómo hermano mayor, se puso a ayudar desde muy chico a su padre en la agricultura y ganado lechero, por lo tanto no logro terminar el bachillerato y por insistencia de sus hermanos mayores fue incluso unos años a Argentina pero por fallecimiento de su padre tuvo que volver a Bolivia y empezar una nueva vida junto con su futura esposa aprovechando el terreno de su padre su parte heredada, decidio trabajar como agricultor y a la producción de leche y al notar que existe mucha demanda de este producto esta dispuesto a invertir y dedicarse exclusivamente a este rubro, pero como se necesita un poco mas de capital esta dispuesto por aprovechar invertir el préstamo en la compra de 2 cabezas de ganado lechero de su hermano que le quiere vender por motivo de viaje.
texts.en:
Edgar comes from a large family comprised of seven siblings.  Most of them started to leave when they were very young, even migrating to Argentina, in search of better living conditions.  As he was the oldest brother left, he started when he was very little to help his father with the farming and the dairy cows.  Therefore, he did not finish high school.  

At his older siblings’ insistence, he even went for a few years to Argentina.  However, upon his father’s death he had to return to Bolivia and start a new life with his future wife.  Taking advantage of the land he inherited from his father, he decided to work as a farmer and milk producer.  

Upon noticing that there is a great demand for this product, he is prepared to invest and devote himself exclusively to this field.  However, he needs a little more capital.  He will use the loan to buy two head of dairy cows from his brother who wants to sell them because he is traveling.

loans.use: to buy two head of dairy cows.

loans.name: Flores Magon Group

texts.es: Teresa, o Doña Tere como de cariño le dicen, es una mujer trabajadora y con ganas de salir adelante ella tiene 58 años de edad, trabaja con un grupo de personas que piden créditos para mejorar sus negocios el grupo se llama Flores Magón. Ella se dedica a elaborar prendas que le mandan hacer y también hace arreglos a las prendas de vestir como arreglar dobladillos, poner sierres, poner botones, hacer blusas, pantalones, faldas, shorts, playeras, elaboración de cortinas, sabanas etc. Dice que tiene su negocio en su casa y que tiene con su negocio desde hace 5 años y que le enseñaron a hacer las confecciones porque se metió a un curso por parte del ayuntamiento de su población y le enseñaron hacer las prendas. También dice que en temporada de frio ella hace sweaters tejidos, gorros, bufandas, guantes, capas, blusas tejidas y ahorita en temporada de calor le mandan hacer blusas de telas delgadas y capris, dice  que ahorita ella está pidiendo un crédito para la compra de telas de diferentes variedades, colores y texturas, hilos, estambres, ganchos, botones, sierres, agujas etc. Platica que el estar pidiendo el crédito le ayudara mucho a su negocio ya que tiene varios pedidos pendientes por hacer y teniendo el capital ella podrá ofrecerle a sus clientas cosas que venda. Las otras integrantes del grupo se llaman María Socorro, Reyna, Clementina, Stephanie, Patricia, Rocío, Vianey, Carol Paola, Norma, Mercedes, Rosa Elena y Jazmín ellas invertirán en sus negocios de abarrotes, en la compra de zapatos y ropa por catalogo, en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de postres para su venta, surtir ropa para dama y caballeros para vender, para surtir colchas por catalogo para su venta y en la compra de bisutería para su venta.
texts.en: Teresa, or Doña Tere as her friends call her, is a hard-working woman with dreams of getting ahead. She is 58 years old and originally from the town of Zitacuaro. She works with a group of people who apply for loans as a group to improve their businesses. The group is called "Flores Magon," and the name of the group comes from the area in which many of the members live. Teresa sews items by request and makes alterations such as fixing hems, putting in zippers and/or buttons. She makes blouses, pants, skirts, shorts, and shirts, as well as items such as curtains and sheets, etc. Teresa has run her business out of her home for the past 5 years. She took a course on making clothing through a program of her local government, and learned how to make alterations. In colder weather, Teresa makes knitted sweaters, hats, scarves, gloves, capes, and knitted blouses. In warmer weather, such as now, she is taking orders for blouses from thin fabrics and capri pants. Teresa is asking for this loan in order to buy fabrics of different colors and textures, thread, yarns, hooks, buttons, zippers, needles, etc. She says that this loan will help her very much with her business by allowing her to complete several requested orders and by having the capital that will make her able to offer items for sale to her clients. The other members of the group are called María Socorro, Reyna, Clementina, Stephanie, Patricia, Rocío, Vianey, Carol Paola, Norma, Mercedes, Rosa Elena, and Jazmín. They will invest their portions of the loan money in their businesses, including a grocery shop, buying clothes and shoes through a catalog, purchasing ingredients for making pastries for sale, and stocking men's and women's clothing, quilts, and jewelry for sale.

loans.use: to purchase materials for sewing, such as different varieties of fabrics, threads, yarns, hooks, buttons, zippers, needles, etc.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
El señor Tomas esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima (desechables y algunos artículos para cocinar) para su negocio de lonches, taco y hamburguesas y realzarles algunos reparaciones al puesto que le están haciendo falta.
El señor Tomas tiene ya mas de 30 años radicando en la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo, el es originario de la ciudad Mante Tamaulipas. El y su esposa se han dedicado a darles lo mejor a sus hijos quienes ya están casados y tiene sus propias familias. 
El negocio lo atienden el señor Tomas y su esposa la señora Mayola, con las ganancias que obtiene del negocio será para pagar el crédito ya que sus hijos les ayudan con los gastos familiares.
Desean mejor su negocio para darles mejor comodidad y atención sus clientes.
Espera que con esta inversión su negocio crezca más y poder ayudar a otras personas en darles trabajo.
texts.en:
Tomas is requesting this loan to purchase supplies (disposable items and some cooking utensils) for his lunch business making tacos and hamburgers and to make some needed repairs to his stall. 

Tomas has lived in the city of Nuevo Laredo for more than 30 years.  He is originally from the city of Mante Tamaulipas.  He and his wife work hard to give their children the best, and they are all now married with their own families.  

The income from the business that Tomas and his wife Mayola run will pay for the loan since their children help with the household expenses.  They want to improve the business to provide more comfort and attention to their customers.

He hopes that this investment will help his business grow so that he can help other people by giving them work.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his business and make repairs to his stall.

loans.name: Chreb's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a village of the Sangke district, where rice farming is a common way to make a living, Chreb is a 34-year-old single. Cabbage-growing is the main source of the family’s income, which she has been in for several years. The current business earns her about KHR 50,000 per day to meet the family’s needs. 

This is the fifth microloan with Kiva's partner for Chreb’s Group of two and they completely paid back the prior loan. Chreb has successfully used the loan to buy a buffalo to help with her farming. 

Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Chreb, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland and she will use some of it to buy gasoline for water pumping. Chreb hopes this loan will enable her to earn a good crop yield from her rice paddy, so as to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland.

loans.name: Mayra Alejandra

texts.es:
Su nombre es Alejandra es de una ciudad llena  de arte aunque no muy reconocida, desde pequeña le gusto el Arte  dibujar y observar de manera creativa cualquier entorno, su primaria no fue muy buena, ya que tuvo que viajar de pueblo en pueblo por cuestiones  de la llamada violencia, por lo cual dejo de dibujar en un tiempo y empezó a preocuparse más por no comer, es desplazada de un pueblo no muy poblado y donde manda la guerrilla, se refugie con su madre y 2 hermanos en  una casa de estructura antigua, sin ningún servicio, de ahí ya no los expulso la violencia.
De allí  surgió su gusto por dibujos menos realistas con un detalle misterioso, al ser pequeña no sintió que fuera anormal correr de un lugar a otro o esconderse o no tener ningún tipo de bienestar económico, al contrario sintió que todo fue una aventura o al menos aquí no mostrara tristeza alguna, pues ya viene incluida desde su enseñanza y es que de los sucesos no muy afortunados le enseñaron a  hacer personas de bien. Concretaron personalmente en quedarse con lo bueno que mostró cada acontecimiento. Su historia es larga y ha vivido mucho para su edad pero en fin, hoy este solo es un capitulo que dará a mostrar y de allí nació uno de sus mayores anhelos y sueños plasmar sus vivencias de manera artística y aventurera.
De antemano agradezco su apoyo ofrecido  y su atención dirigida.
texts.en:
Her name is Alejandra. She is from a city that is full of art, although it is not very well known. Since she was little she liked art, drawing and creatively observing any surroundings. Her primary school wasn't very good, since she had to travel from town to town due to violence. She stopped drawing for awhile and started to worry more because there wasn't anything to eat. She is displaced from a sparsely populated town where the guerillas rule and has taken refuge with her mother and two siblings in an old house with no utilities. The violence hasn't made them them leave there. 

That was when she started to like less realistic drawings with mysterious details. When she was little she she didn't feel it was abnormal to run from one place to another or to hide or have no financial stability. To the contrary, she thought it was all an adventure or at least she wouldn't show any sadness. It was something that she was raised with and these unlucky events taught them how to be good people. They personally determined that they would keep whatever good thing each event would show. Her story is long and she has lived a lot for her age, but this is just a chapter that will be seen and from that her biggest wishes and dreams are to express her life in an artistic and adventurous way.

She would like to give her thanks in advance for the support offered and for your attention.

loans.use: to finish her Graphic Design and Advertising program.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз опытная портниха и создает шедевры таджикских национальных платьев. Ей  35 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет  4 детей. Дети Дилором, Мархабо, Мавлюда и Махлиё еще не совершеннолетние. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами  5 лет назад она начала свой бизнес. Она имеет ателье в центре города. Благодаря  хорошему сервису, она обладает широким кругом клиентов. Ее клиенты женщины со вкусом и очень трудно их удовлетворять, но Дилафруз с легкостью справляется с их капризами. Она нуждается новой швейной машинки, но ее доход не позволяет ей купить это. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  1500 долларов США для покупки новой швейной машинки. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilafruz is an experienced dressmaker who creates beautiful traditional Tajik dresses.  She is 35 years old, married, and raising four children.  Her children (Dilorom, Marhabo, Mavlyuda and Makhlyo) are still minors.

Dilafruz started her business five years ago, in order to provide her family with all the necessities of life.  She owns a sewing studio in the center of town, and thanks to the quality of her service, she enjoys a large number of customers.  Her customers are fashionable women who are sometimes difficult to satisfy, but Dilafruz knows how to cope with their whims.

Although Dilafruz needs a new sewing machine, her income doesn't allow her to make this purchase.  She is therefore requesting a loan of $1,500 to buy a new sewing machine. She is relying on you and is looking forward to your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to sew traditional dresses.

loans.name: Maria Fernanda

texts.es: Ella es Fernanda quiere que kiva le brinde esta gran ayuda  por que en estos momentos no cuenta con una estabilidad económica y se le ha hecho un poco difícil pagar la universidad ya que tiene que colaborarle a su mama con otras obligaciones del hogar y ella se encuentra sin trabajo ya que es una persona de la tercera edad y es muy difícil que la ubiquen  y menos sin tanta experiencia  por esas razones se le ha complicado un poco el pago al enteresarse de este convenio se puso muy feliz ya que es una oportunidad que muy poco se ve además sus ganas de salir adelante le han hecho tener mas fuerzas para no dejar a un lado su estudio y seguir luchando por sus sueños a veces uno se siente derrumbado por cosas que pasan pero Dios  ayuda cada día a tener mas fuerzas y a levantarse con animo para seguir luchando por esas metas  y también las ganas y el animo que me da su mama,  por ella también se encuentra estudiando para sacarla adelante y que se pueda sentir orgullosa de ella  para tener una vida con tranquilidad hay que ser sencillos y humildes así seremos unos grandes seres humanos profesionalmente laboralmente y espiritualmente nunca dejes de luchar y de demostrarle al mundo que quieres salir adelante
texts.en: Her name is Fernanda. She wants Kiva to give her this big help because at this time she has no financial stability. It has become a little difficult to pay for college since she has to help her mother with the household responsibilities. Her mother doesn't have a job because she is elderly and it is very difficult to find her one, especially since she doesn't have much experience. For these reasons the payment has been a little difficult but when she found out about this agreement she was very happy. This is an opportunity that is seldom seen. In addition her eagerness to get ahead has given her more strength to not ignore her studies and keep fighting for her dreams. Sometimes you feel defeated by things that happen but God helps everyday to have more strength and get up eager to keep fighting for her goals. She also has the encouragement that her mother gives her. It's because of her that she is studying to get her ahead so she can make her proud and have a calm life. You have to have a humble and simple life. That is how we will be great human beings professionally, at work, and spiritually. Never stop fighting and showing the world that you want to get ahead.

loans.use: to finish her academic Graphic Design and Advertising program.

loans.name: Steven Antony

texts.es:
Steven tiene 34 años de edad, es casado y vive en el sector de La Lopez Arellano, Choloma.
Steven tiene 3 años de dedicarse a su propio negocio de venta de comida como, pollo frito con tajadas, tacos rellenos de pollo, patelitos rellenos de carne molida y arroz, y otra variedad de comida. Siempre la ha gustado cocinar las ventas las hace a diario y esta satisfecha con las utilidades que le deja el negocio.Esta solicitando un prestamo con Odef de 11000 para comprar un frizer para refrigeracion de las verduras y las carnes para mantenerlos frescos, y otra parte la invertira en hacer algunas mejoras a su casa.La meta es seguir trabajando para que su negocio crezca y en lo personal tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Steven is 34 years old, married and lives in the La Lopez Arellano area of Choloma, Honduras. He has made a living for the past three years running his own business selling foods like fried chicken, chicken tacos, empanadas filled with ground beef and rice, and other kinds of foods. He has always liked to cook, and he sells his food every day and is satisfied with the profits. He is requesting a loan to purchase a freezer to store vegetables and meats to keep them fresh, and he plans to use a portion of the loan to make some improvements to his home. His goal is to keep working so the business grows and he can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer to store vegetables and meats, and use another portion to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Víctor

texts.es:
Víctor, de 42 años de edad, esta casado con Victoria quien se dedica al comercio y es madre de sus 02 hijos, con quienes vive en su casa propia.Víctor se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, es por eso que tiene muchos clientes que van en busca de algún artículo o producto de primera necesidad ya que saben que lo encontraran ahi y que seran atendidos de la mejor manera.  Su negocio está ubicado en un espacio que acondiciono en su casa, atendiendo  desde hace 08 años.Le gusta su negocio pues no tiene que salir mucho de casa  y puede apoyar a sus hijos con las tareas escolares.Por ahora desea seguir trabajando mucho para ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes.Este es el crédito número 05 con Kiva y está muy contento de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio , por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Con el monto solicitado de 3000 soles, comprará productos y mercadería como arroz, azúcar, aceites, golosinas, bebidas gasificadas y otros, para poder ofrecer en mayor cantidad y variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: Víctor is 42 years old and married to Victoria, who makes a living in commerce and is mother of their two children. They all live together in their own home. Victor makes a living selling food products, so he has a lot of customers who come looking for some item or primary-need product because they know they can find it there and he provides excellent service. His business is located in a space he set up in his home, and he has worked there for eight years. He likes his business because he doesn't have to leave the house a lot and can help his children with their homework. Now he wants to keep working a lot in order to offer a better variety of products to his customers. This is his fifth loan with Kiva, and he is very content in knowing that he has financial support so he feels secure in advancing the business, and he promises to make his payments on time. Victor is requesting the loan to purchase products and supplies like rice, sugar, oil, snacks, soft drinks and other items so he can offer a larger quantity and variety of products to his customers.

loans.use: to purchase products like rice, sugar, oil and other items.

loans.name: Taulau

texts.en: Taulau is 47 years old and married with 4 children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, taamu, yams, and cucumbers that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 2 years. Taulau needs a loan to buy chemicals, weed spray, a chainsaw, and knives for her plantation. She has been a member of SBPD since 2012. Taulau will use the profits from her sales to support her family.

loans.use: To buy chemicals, weed spray, a chainsaw, and knives for her business

loans.name: Timur

texts.ru: Тимуру 27 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети еще маленькие. Он работает в государственной организации инспектором. Его жена тоже работает государственной организации. Они используют зарплату для обеспечения детей со всеми необходимыми средствами. Тимур очень старается создать хорошею условию, чтобы его семья жила счастливо. Однако, его жена больна и поэтому нуждается в лечении. Тимур не имеет денег для лечения жены. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 500 долларов США для лечения жены. Его жена серьезно больна и нуждается вашей доброты.
texts.en:
Timur is 27 years old.  He is married and raising two children who are still very young.  He works as an inspector in a government agency.  His wife also works for a government agency.  Timur and his wife use their salaries to provide their children with all the necessities of life.  

Timur tries very hard to create a good environment for his family, so that they can live happily.  However, his wife is currently ill and needs medical treatment.  Timur does not have enough money to pay for her medical treatment and he is therefore requesting a loan of $500.  His wife is seriously ill and relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his young wife's medical treatment.

loans.name: Norma Maricela

texts.es:
Norma, posee una tienda. Ella vive con su familia, su esposo y sus hijos, ambos trabajan en el hogar para sacar a sus hijos adelante, ya que no tiene familiares en el extranjero. Norma, comenzó el negocio gracias al apoyo de sus padres, quienes le enseñaron como realizarlo; este lo posee en su casa y no tiene horarios establecidos.  
El préstamo que necesita le permitirá comprar mercadería como: arroz, aceite, queso, frijol, entre otros productos para ofrecerle a sus clientes. Esta inversión le ayudara a crecer, tener más surtido el negocio y así obtener mayores niveles de  ventas. 
Su sueño es tener casa propia, aumentar las mercadería y con ello obtener mayores ganancias para brindarle una mejor educación  a sus hijos.
texts.en: Norma has a store. She lives with her family, her husband and their children, and both parents work in the home to make headway for the kids since they don't have relatives abroad. Norma started her business with the support of her parents, who taught her how to do it. She runs the store out of her home and doesn't have a fixed schedule. She is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise like rice, oil, cheese, beans and other products to offer her customers. This investment will help her grow the business by having more items in stock and thus increasing her sales volume. Her dream is to have her own home, to expand her merchandise and to earn more income to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: to purchase products like rice, oil, cheese, beans and other items.

loans.name: Sarvelio

texts.es:
Sarvelio, se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería. Él tiene 30 años de edad, está acompañado y vive en casa propia, el cultivo y la ganadería lo realiza para cubrir los gastos del hogar, ya que solo él trabaja para sacar adelante a su familia. El oficio lo aprendió desde pequeño con sus padres  y lo lleva acabo de lunes a sábado de 6:00 am a 12:00 pm, ya posee 10 años de trabajar en lo propio.
El préstamo que el requiere le servirá para comprar insumos agrícolas tales como: abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas y semilla. Este le ayudara a incrementar la productividad y sus ingresos con el crédito de KIVA.
Su objetivo es mejorar económicamente para tener una mejor calidad de vida y brindársela al igual  a  su familia.
texts.en: Sarvelio makes a living in agriculture and livestock. He is 30 years old, in a relationship and lives in his own home. He farms and raises livestock to cover household expenses, since he is the only one who works to make headway for the family. He learned the trade from his parents from a young age and he works Monday-Saturday from 6 a.m. to noon. He has been working on his own for 10 years. He is requesting the loan to purchase farming supplies like fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides and seeds. This Kiva loan will help him increase his productivity and his income. His goal is to make progress financially to have a better quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, herbicides, insecticides and seeds.

loans.name: Daine Vanessa

texts.es:
Su Nombre es Vanessa tiene 18 años, vive con sus padres, su abuela y su hermana, toda su época y  el transcurso de su estudio lo realizo  en un muy buen colegio, allí curso lo que fue preescolar, transición, toda la primaria y bachillerato.
Mientras que adelantaba el bachillerato realizaba un estudio adicional en el como técnico hotelera y turismo la cual duro 4 años. Al culminar sus estudios técnicos comenzó  a interesarse en la parte de la medicina o la parte de la contabilidad, iba a presentar a la universidad pero no habían cupos para la rama de la medicina, así que busco otras universidades, tuvo presente varias pero eran muy costosas encontró la institución allí le dieron a conocer las carreras que ofrecía la corporación e inicio su carrera a principios del año 2012 en esta corporación con la carrera de contabilidad financiera.
Actualmente cursa tercer  semestre. Es una persona con varios principios y valores como lo son el respeto, honestidad, se considera alegre, divertida, le gusta compartir con las personas que le rodean y quieren lo mejor de ella.
Es un poco intolerante con las personas envidiosas e inmaduras, en su tiempo libre escucha música de los 70 y 80 o en ocasiones variada, practica del baloncesto y el ciclismo, a veces ve películas de interés.
texts.en: Vanessa is 18 years old and lives with her parents, grandmother and sister. She has always gone to a very good school from preschool on up. While she was going toward her high school diploma she took additional courses in hospitality and tourism for four years. Upon finishing those studies she became interested in medicine and accounting, but the local university didn't offer any medicine courses, so she looked at other schools. She found some, but they were very expensive. She found this institution (CampoAlto) and learned about the courses offered, and at the start of 2012 she began working toward a degree in financial accounting. She is currently in her third semester. Vanessa is person with principles and values, such as respect and honesty. She considers herself to be happy and fun, and she likes to be around people who want the best for her. She is a little intolerant of people who are jealous and immature. In her free time she likes to listen to music from the 70s and 80s, play basketball, go cycling or sometimes watch interesting movies.

loans.use: to finish her course in financial accounting.

loans.name: Saphorn's Group

texts.en:
Saphorn is 45 years old and widowed. She has three children. Saphorn lives in a rural area located in the Sangke district, Cambodia. She rents a plot of farmland to grow sapodilla to earn a living, which she has been doing for five years. 

Saphorn has been with VisionFund for six cycles, while the other member has been with VisionFund for four cycles. Saphorn completely paid back the past loans, which have helped her relieve her family’s burden from cycle to cycle. Now, she is leading her group to request a loan of 1,400,000 KHR each. As the leader, Saphorn will use her portion to lease more plots of farmland to grow sapodilla. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her family’s business and earn more income to make a better living.

loans.use: To lease more plots of farmland to grow sapodilla

loans.name: Shodigul

texts.ru: Шодигул живет в городе Нурек. Нурек находится в 70 км к юго-востоку от столицы Таджикистана. Шодигул замужем. Ей 29 лет. У нее двое маленьких детей - сыну 4 года, а дочьке 9 месяцев. Муж Шодигул разнорабочий. Сама Шодигул работает швеёй уже два года. Она вышивает национальные женские платья и принимает заказы у себя на дому. Шодигул запрашивает кредит для приобретения швейной машины, чтобы улучшить и ускорить процесс своей работы.
texts.en:
Shodigul lives in Nurek, a town located 70 km southeast of Dushanbe, the capital.  She is 29 years old and married.  She has two young children: a son who is four and a daughter who is nine months old.  

While her husband does odd jobs, Shodigul works as a seamstress.  She has been involved in this activity for two years already.  She sews traditional Tajik dresses for women, fulfilling orders at home.

She is requesting a loan to purchase a sewing machine, which will allow her to work faster and more efficiently.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Thy

texts.en: Thy is 47 years old. She is married and resides with six children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fish for more than seven years, earning approximately $5 daily. Her husband runs a watch repair shop. He makes an income of $3 per day. Four of her children are employed. They earn about $15 each day. In order to improve her family’s finances, Thy requests a loan of $300 to purchase watches and spare parts for resale. By doing so, she would generate more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand the business and help her children earn bachelors degrees. Moreover, she wants to build the upper floor of her house to provide enough space for the family.

loans.use: to purchase watches and spare parts for resale

loans.name: Rahmatullo

texts.ru: Рахматулло молодой и активный человек. Ему 21 года. Он является одним из лучших студентов и справляется с учебой отлично. Рахматулло в свободное время предоставляет услуги такси и таким образом зарабатывает деньги для содержания семьи, так как его родители старые и имеют маленький доход.
